section.title: Issue Tracking
section.p: Use the links below to review or create issues tickets to track software defects or feature requests.

Please note that this is not a support forum. Before filing any tickets, please review the documentation and mailing list archives. Please also consider posting a message to the appropriate user list before creating a new ticket.

section.title: Legacy Issues
section.p: Use the link below to review prior issues that were tracked at the iBATIS for Java SourceForge site, before iBATIS joined Apache. These links are provided for research purposes only. All new issues must be registered in the ASF tracking system.

tr.td: iBATIS Java Legacy Issues - Use for reference only!
iBATIS.NET Legacy Issues - All tickets were transferred
